content: REITs Investments SeedlyTV EP05 Asked by AnonymousAsked on 01 Jun 2019Should I invest in Ascendas Hospitality Trust (Q1P) or MapleTree Com trust (N2IU)?Got pretty interested in investing in REITs lately. I only have $2000 and am wondering which of the 2 i should invest in to begin. Any idea?3 answersAnswerBump0
Answers (3)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Jonathan Chia Guangrong, Fund Manager at JCG FundLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 02 Jun 2019Mapletree commercial is rather expensive at the moment. Look to enter at a time when the spread between nav and current price is at its lowest.0 comments2
Tan Wei MingLevel 5. GeniusUpdated on 07 Jun 2019It is not about the price but the valuation and the industry the REIT is in.2 comments1

Question Poster02 Jun 2019I kinda like this 2 reits including the industries they are in. Provided that I have only 2k, would it be better if I invest in Q1P to have more shares and better dividend payout?Tan Wei Ming02 Jun 2019If I am not wrong the valuation for the hospitality reit is at P/B 1 or lower which is definitely cheaper than MCT. You should look at the historical distributions for the hospitality reit to see if it is growing YOY. I kinda avoid hospitality reit because it is really very cyclical so doesnt provide the stability that MCT provides.
Gabriel Tham, Kenichi Tag Team Member at Tag TeamLevel 8. WizardAnswered on 01 Jun 2019Both are very different types of REITs. If you only have $2k, perhaps a REIT etf is better.0 comments0
